tests.title: should process a valid payment
tests.fullTitle: Payment Flow with POM should process a valid payment

err.message:
CypressError: `cy.visit()` failed trying to load:

http://localhost:3010/payment-form.html

The response we received from your web server was:

  > 404: Not Found

This was considered a failure because the status code was not `2xx`.

If you do not want status codes to cause failures pass the option: `failOnStatusCode: false`

Because this error occurred during a `before each` hook we are skipping the remaining tests in the current suite: `Payment Flow with POM`
